name: chubbiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being fat, usually in a pleasant way, like a child: He has struggled against a tendency towards chubbiness. She shed her childhood chubbiness years ago. See
chubby
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a cute kid - blond with just the right amount of chubbiness.The basic cause of chubbiness is no different for animals or humans.He wrote a song in praise of chubbiness.
